EmailTemplate.name: 201703_Americas_Nurture_WTTF_mih.201703_Americas_Email_WTTF_Part2_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Spotlight on GoDirect Services (Welcome Email Part 2)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
GODIRECT SERVICES Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}.
I hope this email finds you well. Today I’d like to introduce you to Honeywell’s GoDirect services.
GoDirect services include GoDirect Cabin Connectivity, GoDirect Flight Services and GoDirect Maintenance and Service Plans. GoDirect Cabin Connectivity <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/cabin-connectivity]]>
GoDirect Cabin Connectivity services allow your passengers to be both productive and entertained. From airtime services to routing services, you’ll find the support you need to stay connected. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/GoDirect_Flight.jpg]]> GoDirect Flight Services <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/flight-services]]>
For more than 30 years, we’ve planned global flights for thousands of owners and operators. Our portfolio also includes fuel efficiency services and database updates to support your avionics. GoDirect Maintenance and Service Plans <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/maintenance-and-service-plans]]>
We have the maintenance plans to protect you from the unexpected and the global network to provide 24/7 support anywhere you fly. Please let me know if you have any questions about GoDirect. I’ll get you in touch with a team member immediately.
Thank you,
Gus Garayzar Rodriguez
Manager, Customer Support
Direct: 636-486-2035
Mobile: 480-257-8995
Email: Gustavo.Garayzar@Honeywell.com
